Field Detail

$Priority

public int $Priority
Email priority (1 = High, 3 = Normal, 5 = low). Default value is 3.

$CharSet

public string $CharSet
Sets the CharSet of the message. Default value is "iso-8859-1".

$ContentType

public string $ContentType
Sets the Content-type of the message. Default value is "text/plain".

$Encoding

public string $Encoding
Sets the Encoding of the message. Default value is "8bit".

$From

public string $From
Sets the From email of the message. Default value is "root@localhost".

$FromName

public string $FromName
Sets the From name of the message. Default value is "root".

$Sender

public string $Sender
Sets the Sender email of the message. If not empty, will be sent via -f to sendmail or as 'MAIL FROM' in smtp mode. Default value is "".

$Subject

public string $Subject
Sets the Subject of the message. Default value is "".

$Body

public string $Body
Sets the Body of the message. Default value is "".

$WordWrap

public string $WordWrap
Sets word wrapping on the message. Default value is false (off).

$Mailer

public string $Mailer
Method to send mail: ("mail", "sendmail", or "smtp"). Default value is "mail".

$Sendmail

public string $Sendmail
Sets the path of the sendmail program. Default value is "/usr/sbin/sendmail".

$MailerDebug

public bool $MailerDebug
Turns phpmailer debugging on or off. Default value is false (off).

$UseMSMailHeaders

public bool $UseMSMailHeaders
Turns Microsoft mail client headers on and off. Default value is false (off).

$Host

public string $Host
Sets the SMTP host. Default value is "localhost".

$Port

public int $Port
Sets the SMTP server port. Default value is 25.

$Helo

public string $Helo
Sets the CharSet of the message. Default value is "localhost.localdomain".

$Timeout

public int $Timeout
Sets the SMTP server timeout. Default value is 10.

$SMTPDebug

public bool $SMTPDebug
Sets SMTP class debugging on or off. Default value is false (off).

$Version

private string $Version
Holds phpmailer version.

$to

private array $to
Holds all "To" addresses.

$cc

private array $cc
Holds all "CC" addresses.

$bcc

private array $bcc
Holds all "BCC" addresses.

$ReplyTo

private array $ReplyTo
Holds all "Reply-To" addresses.

$attachment

private array $attachment
Holds all attachments.

$CustomHeader

private array $CustomHeader
Holds all custom headers.

$boundary

private string $boundary
Holds the message boundary.

IsHTML method sets message type to HTML. Returns void.

IsSMTP method sets Mailer to use SMTP. Returns void.

smtp_send method sends mail via SMTP using PhpSMTP (Author: Chris Ryan). Returns bool.

                           var $addr)
addr_append method creates recipient headers. Returns string.

wordwrap

private string wordwrap(var $message,
                        var $length)
wordwrap wraps message for use with mailers that don't automatically perform wrapping. Written by philippe. Returns string.

create_header

private string create_header()
create_header assembles message header. Returns a string if sucessful or false if unsucessful.

create_body

private string create_body()
create_body assembles the message body. Returns a string if sucessful or false if unsucessful.

AddAttachment

public bool AddAttachment(var $path,
                          var $name,
                          var $encoding,
                          var $type)
AddAttachment check if attachment is valid and add to list. Returns false if the file was not found.
Parameters:
$name - Default Value: ""
$encoding - Default Value: "base64"
$type - Default Value: "application/octet-stream"

attach_all

private string attach_all()
attach_all attach text and binary attachments to body. Returns a string if sucessful or false if unsucessful.

encode_file

private string encode_file(var $path,
                           var $encoding)
encode_file encode attachment in requested format. Returns a string if sucessful or false if unsucessful.
Parameters:
$encoding - Default Value: "base64"

encode_string

private string encode_string(var $str,
                             var $encoding)
encode_string encode string to requested format. Returns a string if sucessful or false if unsucessful.
Parameters:
$encoding - Default Value: "base64"

ClearAddresses

public void ClearAddresses()
ClearAddresses clears all recipients assigned in the TO array. Returns void.

ClearCCs clears all recipients assigned in the CC array. Returns void.

ClearBCCs clears all recipients assigned in the BCC array. Returns void.

ClearReplyTos clears all recipients assigned in the ReplyTo array. Returns void.

public void ClearAllRecipients()
ClearAllRecipients clears all recipients assigned in the TO, CC and BCC array. Returns void.
